pageContext.claim: “People come up to me, ‘Sir, we want to follow you. They don't let us on.’ And it was so different than it was even six, seven months ago.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence for this claim that people who want to follow Trump on social media are somehow blocked from doing so. In some cases, Trump supporters have been banned from Twitter or other platforms, not for supporting Trump or espousing conservative views, but for offensive speech that violates the terms of service.
